product_Description: Coler 20F facewash for a vibrant and refreshing skincare experience.
product_Ingredients: Aqua, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, etc.
how_To_Use: Wet face, apply the facewash, massage, and rinse off with water.
